attributes.action: legislate to outlaw discrimination in the provision of goods and services on the basis of membership of or connection to the Armed Forces
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There have been a few instances recently of serving members of the armed forces being either treated badly or completely refused service by companies because of their association with the armed forces. The Government should act to make sure this can't happen.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
